channel.title: Comments on: Installing Squid Proxy Server with User & Password

item.title: By: Sebastian annett
item.dc:creator: Sebastian annett
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/installing-squid-proxy-server-with-user-password/#comment-4581">Fahad Ahammed</a>.
Hey Fahad,
I need to be able to add/delete multiple users on my subnet. I also need to know how to assign certain ip on subnet to certain users and not others. I hope this makes sense :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Fahad Ahammed.

item.title: By: Sebastian annett
item.dc:creator: Sebastian annett
item.description: Hey, was wondering how do you set multiple users and password please on a subnet
item.content:encoded: Hey, was wondering how do you set multiple users and password please on a subnet
